term.title: spectral photon radiance

item.text: The photon radiance, Lp, at wavelength per unit wavelength interval. The SI unit is s-1 m-3 sr-1, but a commonly used unit is s-1 m-2 sr-1 nm-1. Alternatively, the term can be used with the amount of photons (mol or its equivalent einstein) the SI unit then being mol s-1 m-3 sr-1 and the common unit mol s-1 m-2 sr-1 nm-1.
